I like to be comfortable when I'm working so I usually wear scrubs.
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I'm not sure if I'll be able to balance my work and my personal life.
my best friend lives in a big city.
I'm relaxing at home and enjoying some time to myself after my trip to London.

content.text: hey! what are you up to today?
just relaxing at home, my best friend lives in a big city so i'm trying to enjoy some time to myself after a trip to London.
oh that's so cool! i've never been to London before, how was it?
it was amazing! i got to see all the historical sites and learn about the culture.
that sounds amazing! i love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so i spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
that's awesome! i'm more of a hands-on learner so i like to go out and explore the world to learn about it.
that's cool too! i love to go camping and hiking, and i've even been skydiving a few times.
i've always wanted to go skydiving! it sounds so scary but also so fun.
it's definitely scary but it's also an amazing experience!
i'm sure it is! i'll have to try it sometime.
you should! it's definitely worth it.
